feed.subtitle: My perspective on tech, math and beyond.

entry.title: Surface Defect Segmentation
entry.summary: An end-to-end workflow for image segmentation on the magnetic tile defect dataset using PyTorch, PyTorch Lightning, Segmentation models, and MLflow. This notebook trains state of the art image segmentation models on a highly imbalanced dataset, containing less than 1% of the target class.

entry.title: How to build a Docker image with an Anaconda environment in Paperspace?

link.title: How to build a Docker image with an Anaconda environment in Paperspace?

entry.summary: I'll describe how to build a custom docker image containing an anaconda environment which can be run on Paperspace.

entry.title: Principal component analysis
entry.summary: An expository article on principal componenent analysis (PCA), starting from the theory of random vectors and then gradually moving on to concrete implementation using numpy, and scikit-learn.

entry.title: Standard probability distributions
entry.summary: An expository article on the elementary probability distributions, their properties, and common applications, with calculations done in scipy.
